description:
After facing some major adversity, Seolhwa Cha ends up owning a small snack shop. 
There is just one problem: business is dead.

Seolhwa doesn't have time to sing the blues though because in his attic something has appeared... A portal?
Out from that portal walks... a queen from another world?!

As Seolhwa serves the first bowl of shaved ice to Philia, 
also known as Queen Salt...
He takes his first step toward growing closer to her......

What are you waiting for, Ice Sculptor? The queen wishes for shaved ice.

A frozen treat of a story that will make your heart pound, 
and it all begins in your snack shop!

◆ Two charming heroines!
Enjoy the sweet love story with two lovely and charismatic heroines!
You can't miss one bit of their charm with beautiful artworks and fully voiced scenario.
Korean and Japanese voices feature different gameplay experience.

Philia: CV Marie Miyake / Hyewon Jeong
Mira: CV Mai Ishihara / Mi Jang

◆ Casual snack shop management!
Sharpen cooking skills and collect recipes with simple controls.
Choose your own marketing strategy to create the most booming business in the neighborhood!

◆ Choose your own ending
How the story ends depends on your choice and action.
It is up to you to manage the relationship with the heroines!

◆ Philia's After Story included!
Check out what happens to Seolhwa and Philia after the story meets an end!
name: Miracle Snack Shop
